item.title: Conservatives Fear Arizona House Committee Shakeup Could Stymie Election Integrity Bills
item.description: 'You cannot 'Make America Great Again' without securing our elections,' said Merissa Hamilton.

item.title: Parents Appeal To U.S. Supreme Court After Vermont Courts Ruled Schools Can Vaccinate Kids Against Parents’ Wishes
item.description: All American children are constitutionally entitled to the protections of informed parental consent.

item.title: The Prosecution Of Daniel Penny Is A Soviet-Style Attack On The Right Of Self-Defense
item.description: The prosecution of Daniel Penny fits a pattern that the Soviet-era Russian writer Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn would have recognized and detailed.
